attributes.action: Protect User Privacy: Stop Gov Access to Encrypted Personal Data (IP Act 2016)
attributes.additional_details: Your digital life is your business.  Sign the petition to protect your right to communicate privately and securely.  Don't let the government invade your privacy.  Stand up for digital freedom and your Human Rights.
attributes.background:
Repeal Existing Legislation: Investigatory Powers Act

Withdraw Any Pending Legislation

Public Acknowledgment: The government would likely need to publicly acknowledge and affirm its commitment to protecting encryption and respecting user privacy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Repeal the Investigatory Powers Act
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717199
